entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
